name: eck-autocomplete
description: Autocomplete web component. Suggests options for an input.
author: Leon Eck

scripts.build:showcase: npm run build:library && vite build --outDir www --target esnext --sourcemap && node scripts/generate-cloudflare-pages-config.mjs && node scripts/showcase-prod-build-rework.mjs
scripts.bundle:library: npm run build:library && npm run generate:type-declarations && npm run generate:package-metadata
scripts.publish:library: npm run bundle:library && cd dist && npm publish
scripts.check:ci:types: typescript_version=$(grep '"typescript"' package.json | tail -n 1 | sed -r 's/.*:.*"(.*)",$/\1/') && npx -p typescript@$typescript_version tsc --noEmit
scripts.check:ci:prettier: prettier_version=$(grep '"prettier"' package.json | tail -n 1 | sed -r 's/.*:.*"(.*)",$/\1/') && npx prettier@$prettier_version --ignore-path .gitignore --check .
scripts.test:e2e:start: npm run build:library && npm run watch:showcase
scripts.test:e2e:ci:cypress:install: npm ci --ignore-scripts && npm explore cypress -- npm run postinstall
